answers.answer: Hello,Various possibilities are there for your symptoms.It can be due to sleep apnea,chronic fatigue syndrome,fibromyalgia,Testosterone deficiency in males,menopause in elderly females,Diabetes,cardiac pathologies,carcinoid syndrome and thyroid abnormality.I feel that a complete clinical examination by a physician and sleep specialist along with thorough investigations to rule out the above possibilities are needed.Without physical examination,diagnosis is tough.Hope it helps.Take care and pls do keep me posted on how you are doing.

question: Once in awhile I'm woken up between 4 and 5 am with face flushing, short of breath and my blood pressure is low, heart rate is up.  After about 15 minutes I have a chill, my bp and heart are back to normal, but it takes about 45 minutes for my breath to get back to normal.
title: WAKE UP WITH FACE FLUSH
